Ladies and gentlemen, until late last night, the

Trang City were still trying to prevent the fire
on Co Tien Mountain from spreading to residential areas
near many campers
camping on the mountain.  He panicked and fled
the
area late last night. The fire was still
raging and continued to spread for
many kilometers. Before that, at 4:40 p.m. the same
day, the fire was still planned for production forest land
with a lot of grass.
Nearly 100
people, including fire police,
rangers, and border guards,
were mobilized to the scene to
localize and extinguish the fire. However, the
wind was strong and the weather was dry and dry.  Many
flammable plants and trees caused the fire to spread,
making it difficult to put out the fire. Until 9
p.m. last night, 25 campers were
brought down the mountain safely by the authorities. Local authorities
set up blockades in
residential areas to check.  households at the foot of the mountain
to have a plan to evacuate people in case of a
fire.
Yesterday morning in Vinh Long, a
wooden boat carrying rice suddenly sank in the river. The
incident did not cause any human casualties but
destroyed 23 tons of rice.  sank in
the river at about 8:30, Mr. Vo Thanh Toan,
born in 1986, residing in Phung Hiep district,
Hau Giang province, was driving the wooden boat and was accompanied by his
wife, Ms. Tran Xeu Len, born in 1985,
when the vehicle arrived at the
River Junction area.  Due to the
rapid ebb and flow of the water, the wooden boat
flipped sideways and then collided with a nearby bridge
to stop, resulting in the wooden boat with a
load of 25 tons and 23 tons of rice being
completely sunk.  Security in Tan

people quickly came to the scene to help

plastic into the sea and for more than a month now

This product has been following the ocean waves onto the beaches

city ​​of Mexico However, the
